languages.text: {n}Мужчина молчит очень долго, а воздух около когитатора ощутимо нагревается. Наконец, молчание прерывается.{/n} "Я бы сказал: любезная сестрица, что за глупый вопрос. Это же я, Дарий — твой старший брат, которого ты обрекла на вечную муку".

{n}The man says nothing for a long time, and the air around the cogitator grows noticeably hotter. Finally, he speaks:{/n} "I would say: dear sister, what a silly question. It is me, Darius, your older brother, whom you condemned to eternal torment."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина молчит очень долго, а воздух около когитатора ощутимо нагревается. Наконец, молчание прерывается.{/n} "Я бы сказал: любезная сестрица, что за глупый вопрос. Это же я, Дарий — твой старший брат, которого ты обрекла на вечную муку".

{n}The man says nothing for a long time, and the air around the cogitator grows noticeably hotter. Finally, he speaks:{/n} "I would say: dear sister, what a silly question. It is me, Darius, your older brother, whom you condemned to eternal torment."

{n}The man says nothing for a long time, and the air around the cogitator grows noticeably hotter. Finally, he speaks:{/n} "I would say: dear sister, what a silly question. It is me, Darius, your older brother, whom you condemned to eternal torment."

{n}The man says nothing for a long time, and the air around the cogitator grows noticeably hotter. Finally, he speaks:{/n} "I would say: dear sister, what a silly question. It is me, Darius, your older brother, whom you condemned to eternal torment."

languages.text: {n}El hombre no responde durante un largo rato y el aire en torno al cogitador se calienta considerablemente. Finalmente, habla:{/n} «Respondería: qué tontería, hermana mía. Soy yo, Darius, tu hermano mayor, a quien condenaste al tormento eterno».
languages.original_text: {n}The man says nothing for a long time, and the air around the cogitator grows noticeably hotter. Finally, he speaks:{/n} "I would say: dear sister, what a silly question. It is me, Darius, your older brother, whom you condemned to eternal torment."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre no responde durante un largo rato y el aire en torno al cogitador se calienta considerablemente. Finalmente, habla:{/n} «Respondería: qué tontería, hermana mía. Soy yo, Darius, tu hermano mayor, a quien condenaste al tormento eterno».

languages.text: {n}眼前的人沉默了很久很久，沉思者周围的空气明显升温。到最后，他终于开了口。{/n}“我会说，亲爱的妹妹，你怎么会问出这么愚蠢的问题？我是你的哥哥达利乌斯，是你惩罚我，让我承受无尽的折磨。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man says nothing for a long time, and the air around the cogitator grows noticeably hotter. Finally, he speaks:{/n} "I would say: dear sister, what a silly question. It is me, Darius, your older brother, whom you condemned to eternal torment."

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的人沉默了很久很久，沉思者周围的空气明显升温。到最后，他终于开了口。{/n}“我会说，亲爱的妹妹，你怎么会问出这么愚蠢的问题？我是你的哥哥达利乌斯，是你惩罚我，让我承受无尽的折磨。”

languages.text: {n}男は長い間何も言わず、考算機の周りの空気がわかるほど暑くなる。最終的に彼は言う。{/n}「私はこう言うだろう。親愛なる妹よ、なんて馬鹿げた質問なんだ。私だよ、ダリウス、あなたの兄、永遠の苦しむように運命づけられた者だ」
languages.original_text: {n}The man says nothing for a long time, and the air around the cogitator grows noticeably hotter. Finally, he speaks:{/n} "I would say: dear sister, what a silly question. It is me, Darius, your older brother, whom you condemned to eternal torment."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は長い間何も言わず、考算機の周りの空気がわかるほど暑くなる。最終的に彼は言う。{/n}「私はこう言うだろう。親愛なる妹よ、なんて馬鹿げた質問なんだ。私だよ、ダリウス、あなたの兄、永遠の苦しむように運命づけられた者だ」

languages.text: {n}Der Mann schweigt eine gefühlte Ewigkeit und die Luft um den Cogitator wird spürbar heißer. Schließlich erklärt er:{/n} "Ich würde sagen: Meine liebe Schwester, was für eine alberne Frage. Ich bin es, Darius, dein älterer Bruder, den du zu ewiger Folter verdammt hast."
languages.original_text: {n}The man says nothing for a long time, and the air around the cogitator grows noticeably hotter. Finally, he speaks:{/n} "I would say: dear sister, what a silly question. It is me, Darius, your older brother, whom you condemned to eternal torment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann schweigt eine gefühlte Ewigkeit und die Luft um den Cogitator wird spürbar heißer. Schließlich erklärt er:{/n} "Ich würde sagen: Meine liebe Schwester, was für eine alberne Frage. Ich bin es, Darius, dein älterer Bruder, den du zu ewiger Folter verdammt hast."

languages.text: {n}L'homme observe un long silence pendant lequel la température autour du cogitateur grimpe en flèche. Puis, il se décide enfin à parler :{/n} « En voilà, une drôle de question, ma très chère sœur. C'est moi, Darius, ton frère aîné, celui-là même que tu as condamné aux tourments éternels. Alors, {mf|satisfait|satisfaite} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The man says nothing for a long time, and the air around the cogitator grows noticeably hotter. Finally, he speaks:{/n} "I would say: dear sister, what a silly question. It is me, Darius, your older brother, whom you condemned to eternal torment."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme observe un long silence pendant lequel la température autour du cogitateur grimpe en flèche. Puis, il se décide enfin à parler :{/n} « En voilà, une drôle de question, ma très chère sœur. C'est moi, Darius, ton frère aîné, celui-là même que tu as condamné aux tourments éternels. Alors, {mf|satisfait|satisfaite} ? »

languages.text: {n}Adam, uzun bir süre hiçbir şey söylemiyor. Kavramsayarın etrafındaki hava, hissedilir derecede ısınıyor. Sonunda konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Derdim ki sevgili kardeşim, bu ne aptalca bir soru. Ben, sonsuz çileye mahkûm ettiğin ağabeyin Darius'um."
languages.original_text: {n}The man says nothing for a long time, and the air around the cogitator grows noticeably hotter. Finally, he speaks:{/n} "I would say: dear sister, what a silly question. It is me, Darius, your older brother, whom you condemned to eternal torment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam, uzun bir süre hiçbir şey söylemiyor. Kavramsayarın etrafındaki hava, hissedilir derecede ısınıyor. Sonunda konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Derdim ki sevgili kardeşim, bu ne aptalca bir soru. Ben, sonsuz çileye mahkûm ettiğin ağabeyin Darius'um."
